name: VYM Mind Map File
summary: Learn about .VYM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: VYM files can also store scripts that customize how information is processed and visualized.
NOTE: VYM files are .ZIP files that contain an archive of mind map data files.

description: File created by VYM (View Your Mind), a multi-platform mind mapping program; can store ideas, tasks, topics, keywords, and other information; used for visually representing concepts and ideas in a creative way.
